casebody.data:
HOLT, et al.
v.
NC DOT. No. 76A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Melody R. Hairston, Assistant Attorney General, for NC DOT. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC DOT. Fred W. DeVore, III, Charlotte, for Holt, Daniel, et al. Amanda A. Mingo, Charlotte, for Holt, Daniel, et al. F. William DeVore, IV, Charlotte, for Holt, Daniel. *478Derek P. Adler, Charlotte, for Holt, Daniel, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of March 2016 by Plaintiffs to Withdraw Motion to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
